_comment: Configuration file for Offer Savant application content

homepage.tagline:
Your Smartest Step Toward
Owning Your Dream Home
homepage.description: Let's embark on this journey together to discover your winning offer—tailored to your goals, preferences, and the current market.
homepage.descriptionMobile: Making the right offer isn’t just a number—it’s the key to securing your dream home without overpaying.

chat.welcome: Hi there! I’m Agent Mira, your home-buying consultant. Let’s work together to craft the perfect offer for your dream home.
chat.intro: To get started, can you tell me the address of the home you’re interested in making an offer for?
chat.userResponse: Thanks for your message! How can I assist further?
chat.cardSelected: You selected an offer. Let’s proceed with the details.
chat.addressLabel: Enter the address of the property here…
chat.addressThank: Thanks for sharing the address! While I’m pulling up the details of this home, let me ask you an important question.
chat.intermediateMsg: To add an intermediate message here
chat.marketInsight: Done! I’ve got the market insights ready. Let’s take a look and see what they tell us about this property.

Badge_button_5.label: Personalizing the Offer Based on the Dream Home

offerProcess._comment: Defines the steps in the offer creation process

steps._comment: Step 5: Personalize the offer based on user preferences
steps.title: Personalizing The Offer

step1Content._comment: Content for Step 1: Verifying Property Information

agentMessages._comment: Messages from the virtual agent for Step 1
agentMessages.intro: Hi there! I'm Agent Mira, your home-buying consultant. Let's work together to craft the perfect offer for your dream home!
agentMessages.requestAddress: To get started, can you tell me the address of the home you're interested in making an offer for?
agentMessages.addressReceived: Thanks for sharing the address! While I’m pulling up the details of this home, let me ask you an important question.
agentMessages.winningOfferResponse: Got it! I’ll focus on crafting a competitive offer to maximize your chances of winning this home.
agentMessages.propertyRespone: Here’s what I’ve found about this property based on its listing information.
agentMessages.optionsResponse: Thanks for sharing your priorities! I understand your goals for this property, and I’m here to help you make the best decision.
agentMessages.confirmationMessage: Now we’ll dive into the next step: analyzing this property and the market to create your personalized offer!

winningOfferQuestion._comment: Question to understand user's offer priorities
winningOfferQuestion.question: How do you define a winning offer? What’s most important to you when making this decision?
options: I want to win this home, even if it means a higher offer
I want a great deal but still be competitive
I’m cautious & prefer a conservative offer
I’m not sure yet—let’s explore the options together

optionsQuestion._comment: Question to confirm property details accuracy
optionsQuestion.question: If there’s anything that doesn’t match what you’ve seen, let me know so we can make adjustments.

propertyCard._comment: Data and labels for the property verification card
propertyCard.title: Verifying Property Information

footer._comment: Footer content for the property card

features: Volume Ceilings - Roman Tub, Volume Ceilings, Walk-In Closet(s), Maid/In-Law Quarters, Storage
Dual Ovens - Clear Impact Glass, Impact Glass
Putting Green - Clear Impact Glass, Impact Glass
Impact Glass - Clear Impact Glass, Impact Glass
data.description: Located on upscale Asturia Avenue, just a block from Granada Golf Course, this elegantly updated home features soaring volume ceilings, French doors, and an open-flow design. Highlights include a gourmet kitchen with dual ovens, a lush backyard with a putting green and splash pool, and complete impact glass for added security

step1Content.propertyViewLoadingMessage: Buying a home is one of the biggest decisions you’ll ever make. Getting the offer price just right.

step2Content._comment: Content for Step 2: Presenting Comparable Properties

agentMessages._comment: Messages from the virtual agent for Step 2
agentMessages.intro: Now let’s dive into the market analysis! The first step is to look at comparable properties that have recently sold in the area.
agentMessages.propertyMatch: To do this, I’ve matched your target property at 1132 Asturia Ave, Coral Gables, FL 33134 over 300 characteristics to find the most comparable properties in the area. These are homes that are similar in size, features, location, and market trends.
agentMessages.presentComparables: Here’s what I found. Would you like to take a look at the comparable properties to better understand the market?
agentMessages.confirmationMessage: Sounds good! I’ll use this data to help craft your winning offer.

presentPropertyCard._comment: Labels for the comparable properties card

step3Content._comment: Content for Step 3: Analyzing Current Market Conditions

agentMessages._comment: Messages from the virtual agent for Step 3
agentMessages.intro: I’ll take a closer look at the current market conditions for your target property.
agentMessages.competitivePricing: This information will help us fine-tune your offer price and identify the Competitive Pricing Zone—the sweet spot where your offer is competitive without overpaying.
agentMessages.loading: Give me just a moment to crunch the numbers and uncover these key market insights!
agentMessages.confirmationMessage: These factors give us valuable insight into how to position your offer. Let’s use this data to refine our pricing strategy!

marketGauge._comment: Content and data for the market gauge component
marketGauge.title: Analyzing Current Market Conditions

tabs._comment: Tab labels for market analysis scope

speedometer._comment: Labels for the market type speedometer

supplyAvailability._comment: Stats for Supply and Availability category

demandCompetition._comment: Stats for Demand and Competition category

step3Content.marketConditionsLoadingMessage: Price Trends: How property values in the area have been changing recently.

step4Content._comment: Content for Step 4: Property Condition Input

agentMessages._comment: Messages from the virtual agent for Step 4
agentMessages.intro: Let’s look beyond the surface and uncover the true quality and potential of your future home. We’ll also go into comparable sales to fine tune the offer price. This section should take five-ten minutes to complete. I’m excited for you!
agentMessages.standOutFeatures: Here are the stand out features
agentMessages.qualityScorePrompt: Want to know more about the quality score?
agentMessages.insideScoopResponse: Let’s uncover the details most people won’t share with you! Here’s some repairs needed for this home.
agentMessages.repairsAssurance: Don’t worry! We’ll account for this in the home’s offer price. If you have more questions about the repairs, just ask me in the chat box below.
agentMessages.firstImpressionPrompt: Did you get a chance to visit the property? If so, I’d love to hear your thoughts! Let’s start with the overall condition of the home.
agentMessages.dreamHomePrompt: Tell me, what do you imagine your dream home to look like? Feel free to share anything that helps me understand your preferences—details about the home, features you love, or even your lifestyle goals.
agentMessages.submitAnswerPrompt: How well-maintained did it seem? Were there any repairs needed, or anything that stood out to you?
agentMessages.formResponse: Wow, I love seeing your inspiration! This really helps me understand your vision. Let’s make sure this property aligns with it
agentMessages.confirmationMessage: These factors give us valuable insight into how to position your offer. Let’s use this data to refine our pricing strategy!

imageCard._comment: Content for the image card component
imageCard.title: Property Condition Input
imageCard.standOutFeature: This place has amazing views of the woods.

qualityScoreCard._comment: Content for the quality score card component
qualityScoreCard.title: Property Quality Assessment

dropdown._comment: Dropdown options for quality score breakdown
dropdown.title: Here’s the breakdown of all the scores

scores.title: Tear down
scores.description: Requires major repairs and is unsafe or unlivable as-is.

scores.title: Fixer upper
scores.description: Needs maintenance or component replacements to improve livability.

scores.title: Entry level
scores.description: Requires minor maintenance or updates but is generally functional.

scores.title: Premium
scores.description: Well-maintained with recent upgrades and minimal wear.

scores.title: Luxe
scores.description: In excellent condition with high-quality features and no repairs needed.

scores.title: Top-tier
scores.description: Brand-new, flawless condition with luxury features.

videoCard._comment: Content for the video card component
videoCard.title: Property Condition Input

propertyForm._comment: Content for the property update form
propertyForm.agentMessage: Thanks for catching that! Please pick which information to be updated or feel free to type your discrepancy.

labels._comment: Labels for form buttons and fields

step5Content._comment: Content for Step 5: Personalizing The Offer

agentMessages._comment: Messages from the virtual agent for Step 5
agentMessages.intro: Tell me, what do you imagine your dream home to look like? Feel free to share anything that helps me understand your preferences—details about the home, features you love, or even your lifestyle goals.
agentMessages.featuresSubmittedResponse: Got it! Your priorities are clear, and I’ll take these into account as we finalize your offer.
agentMessages.featuresSkippedResponse: No worries! We’ll proceed with what we have so far.
agentMessages.formPrompt: Now you can type, upload images to describe your dream home.
agentMessages.formResponse: Wow, I love seeing your inspiration! This really helps me understand your vision. Let’s make sure this property aligns with it
agentMessages.confirmationMessage: Now that I understand your dream home and priorities, I’ll analyze how this property aligns with them and tailor your offer accordingly. Let’s move forward

propertCard.title: Personalizing the Offer Based on the Dream Home

radioQuestionButton._comment: Radio button question for dream home features

feedback.question: Here are some features buyers often prioritize in their dream home. Select any that apply to you!

step6Content._comment: Content for Step 6: The Recommended Offer

agentMessages._comment: Messages from the virtual agent for Step 6
agentMessages.intro: Thank you for sharing all the important information to help me design the best offer for your target property
agentMessages.reviewOfferPrompt: Please take a moment to review this offer.
agentMessages.expertReviewMessage: Meanwhile, I’ll share these details with one of our expert real estate agents. They’ll double-check my analysis to ensure I haven’t missed anything and confirm the final offer with you soon

finalOfferCard._comment: Content and data for the final offer card
finalOfferCard.title: Presenting the Recommended Offer

offerSection._comment: Labels for the offer recommendation section
offerSection.offerDescription: This offer Balances your need to win this home without overpaying

liveMetricsSection._comment: Labels and insights for live metrics
liveMetricsSection.liveMetricsLabel: Live metrics - updates as you adjust your offer
insightsList: Recent comparable sales suggest strong market analysis
Property condition assessment indicates good value
Current market trends favor balanced offers
Similar homes in the area have sold within 2% of list price

finalOfferCard.validityMessage: This offer recommendation is valid for the next {validityPeriod} days and is based on current market condition

partialMatches: Kitchen size slightly smaller than pretend

offerAdjustmentSlider._comment: Content for the offer adjustment slider
offerAdjustmentSlider.agentMessage: Now would you like to customise your offer? How competitive would you like your offer to be?
offerAdjustmentSlider.instruction: Move the slider to see how different offer amounts affect your win probability and market position

step6Content.recommendedOfferLoadingMessage: Understanding Your Goals: We discussed your definition of a winning offer and what your dream home looks like.

winningOfferOption._comment: Question about defining a winning offer
winningOfferOption.question: How do you define a winning offer? What’s most important to you when making this decision?
options: I want to win this home, even if it means a higher offer
I want a great deal but still be competitive
I’m cautious & prefer a conservative offer
I’m not sure yet—let’s explore the options together

makeAdjustment.question: If there’s anything that doesn’t match what you’ve seen, let me know so we can make adjustments.
options: No, I’d like to make adjustments

insideScoop.question: Curious about the quality of a specific area? Just click to get the inside scoop!

propertyInPerson.question: Have you seen the property in person?
options: Yes I have visited the property
No, I haven’t visited the property

firstImpression.question: What was your first impression of the property?

featuresLooking.question: Are there specific features you’re looking for in your dream home?

marketInsights.question: Would you like to see the key market insights for this property?
options: No, skip to the next step

marketAnalysis.question: Would you like to see a market analysis?

knowAboutQualityScore.question: What would you like to know about the quality score?

repairsNeeded.question: Let’s uncover the details most people won’t share with you! Here’s some repairs needed for this home.

reportDownload.question: Would you like to download a report with all the information we’ve discussed?
